name: is

he/she/it form of
be
Examples
The surname 'Smith' is very common in Britain.This machine is easy to use.Salt is a compound of sodium and chlorine.This is your room - it is rather small, I'm afraid.Grandfather gets quite confused sometimes, and doesn't even know what day it is.

be, used with he/she/it: She is a lawyer.
